query:
ALTER TABLE pirIntegrityQuestions 
ADD COLUMN videoUrl VARCHAR(512) NULL AFTER active,
ADD COLUMN videoThumbnailUrl VARCHAR(512) NULL AFTER videoUrl,
ADD COLUMN videoDuration INT NULL AFTER videoThumbnailUrl,
ADD COLUMN requiresVideoWatch BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE AFTER videoDuration
